com.wegas.mcq.persistence

Class QuestionDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wegas.core.persistence.AbstractEntity
      • com.wegas.core.persistence.NamedEntity
        • com.wegas.core.persistence.variable.VariableDescriptor<QuestionInstance>
          • com.wegas.mcq.persistence.QuestionDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DescriptorListI<ChoiceDescriptor>, Serializable, Cloneable

    @Entity
public class QuestionDescriptor
extends VariableDescriptor<QuestionInstance>
implements DescriptorListI<ChoiceDescriptor>
    Author:
    Francois-Xavier Aeberhard
